name: MAC (Tea_Game)
description:
Credits: Programmers Noah and Ender, storyboarding/Writing Travis and Boko, 3D animations/3D modeling Boko and Noah and Hollow, Music/Sound Noah and Bman

 Mac is a indie FPS game horror made in unity about a scientist who makes a characters come to life by making a deal with the devil but the scientist doesn't do his end of the bargain now all the characters are demons of all kind with you the player having to try to stop them every chapter can you defeat the devil?

For Windows and MacOS 

Tutorial:

Press the {E} keys to click buttons

Use WASD keys to Move

Walk into Objects to pick them up

Esc to pause the game

Chapters:

Chapter 1 "Decaying Creations"
